Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1RNa  (Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: the black-spotted frog,Rana nigromaculata,Northeastern China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli, P. aeruginosa (MIC 25 uM), S. aureus (MIC 12.5 uM), B. cereus, S. lactis (MIC 6.25 uM), C. albicans (MIC 12.5 uM), and cancer cells MCF 7 cells and Hela cells (IC50 ~25 uM).Toxicity: HC50 (50% hemolysis at 105 uM. Helical in SDS or TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Li A, Zhang Y, Wang C, Wu G, Wang Z.2013
Literature Information.Title: Purification, molecular cloning, and antimicrobial activity of peptides from the skin secretion of the black-spotted frog, Rana nigromaculata.
